quest.name: Nowhere to Turn
journal: Kai-Shirr is anxious to see you and Alphinaud back to Eulmore.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Whatever could be so urgent for Lady Chai to summon us thus?

dialogue.name: KAISHIRR
dialogue.text: Lady Chai's up in the parlor. Best not keep her waiting, eh?

dialogue.name: KAISHIRR
dialogue.text: It was the folks over at the Crystarium that told me you'd be down at Journey's Head. And lucky for me, you still were. Running 'round after people's tiring work.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Well, naught here seems out of the ordinary, though I do not see Lady Chai anywhere.

dialogue.name: KAISHIRR
dialogue.text: Probably pacing around outside again. Staring off into the distance and all that. Sighing.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Strange. Let's see if we can find her, and discover the source of her distress.
